analyzeResult.content:
OLD GOLD SEMI-PERMANENT DISPLAY SURVEY
#21
SUBMISSION DATES: :unselected: JAUG. 4, 1997 :unselected: SEPT. 2, 1997 :unselected: AUG. 11, 1997 :selected: SEPT. 8, 1997
PLEASE RANK ACCORDINGLY BY PLACING AN *** IN APPROPRIATE BOX.
DURABILITY/CONSTRUCTION: :selected: × EXCELLENT
EASE OF PLACEMENT: :unselected: GOOD :unselected: FAIR :unselected: POOR
EXCELLENT :unselected: :selected: GOOD :unselected: FAIR :unselected: POOR
IMPACT:
EXCELLENT GOOD
FAIR :selected: X :unselected: :unselected:
POOR :unselected:
PLEASE ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS AS SPECIFICALLY AS POSSIBLE.
Were you able to secure orders for additional Old Gold Inventory? Yos. Additional inventory was needed In order to fill display property. Backup orders were placed with retailers for use in refilling displays as product sold out. This unit allowed us to secure additional inventories of faster selling packings.
Did the placement of the counter unit allow you to Increase facings of other brands on our Plan II/IV's? In some cases, additional facings were obtained for Style. Mostly, the placement of the counter unit allowed us to bulld Old Gold Inventory for all packings which benefits us in moet locations.
What Is/was retailer's response/reaction to the semi-permanent display? Many liked the concept because It doesn't Jeopardize competitive contractual facing requirements. Most like the appearance of the unit but in some cases the large size of the counter unit prohibited placement right at the point of sale. The large size benefited us with Back Bar placements as visibility was perfect and the display created a presence of it's own.
Do you feel the Impact of this display increased consumers awareness of Old Gold? Absolutely. Many consumers commented to our Sales Reps they liked the display and noticed it when they walked Into the store In Indian accounts and Cigarette stores which stock large quantities of cigarettes, this unit was extremely eye catching to
consumers.
What has competitive reaction been? Mostly complimentary. Some questioned retailers as to it's direction - temporary versus permanent.
Did the concept "Semi-Permanent" display allow you placements in vold accounts? If so, could this lead to future placements? Yes. in some cases the sami permanent was used in locations where we could not obtain a separate Price Value unit. Futuro placements of a P-3 arrangement may be possible If we can show the value of an Old Gold display to the retaller.
Was gratis payment sufficient? Yes. Many retailers liked the higher payment and had no problems.
Were we able to extend placement of displays beyond 28 day minimum? Yes, in about 20% of locations refilled product was ordered by retailers and placed in unit.
82087980
General comments/suggestions. 1) Smaller size(6 cin unit) with $10.00 payment for lower volume outlets and those with counter restrictions. 2) Consider this unit as a "Presold Shipper" for use with direct accounts. 3) Make this promotion on-going allowing us more potential placements. 4) Expand program to include a "Newport" Soml perm.
002 :selected:
LORILLARD SYR NY ++++ SALES GENERAL £315 437 4106 BT:60 09/10/97 :selected: :unselected: :selected: :unselected: :selected: :selected: :unselected: :unselected: :unselected:

Were you able to secure orders for additional Old Gold Inventory? Yos. Additional inventory was needed In order to fill display property.
